thread.title: Mark Wahlberg Snuggles Up With His Girls After Their "Daddy-Daughter Bonding Weekend"
thread.title_full: Mark Wahlberg Snuggles Up With His Girls After Their "Daddy-Daughter Bonding Weekend"

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Mark Wahlberg Snuggles Up With His Girls After Their "Daddy-Daughter Bonding Weekend"
text:
Mark Wahlberg Instagram Photo With Daughters January 2017 Mark Wahlberg Snuggles Up With His Girls After Their "Daddy-Daughter Bonding Weekend" January 31, 2017 A photo posted by Mark Wahlberg (@markwahlberg) on Jan 30, 2017 at 10:48am PST 
Mark Wahlberg took a break from promoting his new film, Patriot's Day , to make time for what really matters â€” his family. On Monday, the actor shared a photo of himself snuggled up in bed with his two beautiful daughters, Ella and Grace . In addition to the cute snap, Mark wrote, "Took my girls on a daddy-daughter bonding weekend. #family" The sweet moment comes less than a month after Mark hinted that Justin Bieber came over to his house and had Ella in a tizzy. "She said, 'Dad, that's going to be my husband,' and I said, 'Over my dead body.' Actually, over their dead bodies. I'll just go back to jail," he joked. Sadly, we don't think Justin joined them this time around. Related:
